name: GARL OF THE FOREST
description:
a vary cool and unique roguelike, a short  experience.

had a ton of fun making it, it's probably unbalanced, but really all roguelikes are.

it is missing some things that I wanted to add and fix ,but i'm too lazy.

tips;

you can only grab items when the room is COMPLETELY safe.

always right click right after entering a room;).

hope you enjoy it!

if i get a dollar I will jump to the sky.
